bug.author: fepegar
bug.summary: Image attribute is still present after Subject.remove_image
bug.description:
ğŸ›Bug To reproduce In [1]: import torchio as tio
In [2]: fpg = tio.datasets.FPG()
In [3]: fpg.remove_image('t1')
In [4]: fpg.t1 Out[4]: ScalarImage(path: "/Users/fernando/.cache/torchio/fpg/t1.nii.gz") Expected behavior The attribute should also be gone. Actual behavior The attribute is still present. TorchIO version 0.18.15.
